org.ngi

Class InputUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.InputUtilities

  • public class InputUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Input utilities for various common testing and string formatting functions.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidNumber

        public static boolean isValidNumber(java.lang.String numStr)
        Test a string to see if it is a valid number. String cannot be null or empty, and must parse Float.parseFloat(string).
        Parameters:
        numStr - String to test.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the string can be parsed to a number (float), false otherwise.

      • isValidVariableName

        public static boolean isValidVariableName(java.lang.String nameStr)
        Test to see if a string can be used as a variable name. Test for null or empty and making sure sure first character is a letter. All other characters must be a number or letter.
        Parameters:
        nameStr - String to check.
        Returns:
        True if string can be used as a variable name, false if not valid.

      • isValidBoolean

        public static boolean isValidBoolean(java.lang.String boolStr)
        Test to see if string is a valid boolean: either "true" or "false".
        Parameters:
        boolStr - String to check.
        Returns:
        True if string is a valid boolean, false otherwise.

      • isValidExpression

        public static boolean isValidExpression(java.lang.String expStr)
        Test to see if string is a valid expression. Only tests to see if string is not null or empty.
        Parameters:
        expStr - String to check.
        Returns:
        True if string is not null or empty, false otherwise.

      • isValidString

        public static boolean isValidString(java.lang.String str)
        Check for non-null or empty string
        Parameters:
        str - String to check
        Returns:
        True if string is not null or empty.

      • indentText

        public static java.lang.String indentText(java.lang.String text)
        Simple function to indent text
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Indented text.
